original_title: Viagem aos Confins de um Sítio Onde Nunca Estive
overview: “The artist, in his movement towards the ideal, upsets the stability of any one society. Society aspires to achieve stability; the artist aims for infinity. That is the artist’s responsibility and the spiritual sacrifice demanded of him.” Rui Chafes, O Perfume das Buganvílias, 2012 (19).
title: Viagem aos Confins de um Sítio Onde Nunca Estive
